WorkItem.Description:
Hi there,

when i tried to create a certificate with WPP i got the error "The directory name is invalid",
the error also showed up when i tried to load an existing certificate.

I checked my wpp directory and saw a new folder i did not create: "my user name"/appdata/local/temp"
Looks like WPP had a struggle finding the right temp folder...

I solved the problem by creating the directory %windir%/system32/__windows/temp__ and  %windir%/system32/__windows/tmp__
